description: This is a sample app using react-i18next.

profileForm.alertMessage: Please fill in your profile details below, then use the save button at the bottom of the form to save your changes.

userPropertyForm.title: User Properties
userPropertyForm.cityDescription: Used to find news and events near you.

landingPage.partnerDescription: Leverage our platform to manage your business, events, and orders. Join a community of dancers, teachers, DJs, venues, event coordinators, and suppliers.
landingPage.teachersDescription: Manage your classes and bookings seamlessly. We take 10% per booking.
landingPage.djsDescription: Book gigs and sell your mixes directly on our site.
landingPage.venuesDescription: Start a loyalty program and manage dancer engagements. R3 per stamp.
landingPage.eventCoordinatorsDescription: Create and manage events with different ticket types. We take 10% per ticket.
landingPage.suppliersDescription: Open a shop and sell merchandise directly. We take 10% per order.
landingPage.classManagementDescription: Easily manage classes and events with robust scheduling and booking features.
landingPage.integratedPaymentsDescription: Accept payments directly through our platform with automatic invoicing and reporting.
landingPage.orderTrackingDescription: Keep track of all orders and sales with real-time updates and detailed reports.
landingPage.easyCheckInDescription: Streamline the check-in process for your events and classes.
landingPage.customizationDescription: Tailor the platform to meet your specific needs and branding.
landingPage.callToActionDescription: Become a part of a thriving community and take your business to the next level.
landingPage.loyaltySystemDescription: Build loyalty with your dancers by using the loyalty system.
landingPage.eventManagementDescription: Create and manage events with ease.
landingPage.merchandiseDescription: Sell merchandise directly through our platform.
landingPage.analyticsDescription: Gain insights into your business performance.
landingPage.communityDescription: Engage with a thriving community of partners.
landingPage.newsManagementDescription: Stay updated with the latest news and manage your announcements.
landingPage.accessYourCalendarDescription: Keep track of your events and schedules effortlessly.
landingPage.yourStoreDescription: Manage your store and sell your products seamlessly.
landingPage.orderManagementDescription: Track and manage your orders efficiently.

partnerCard.title: Partner Program
partnerCard.description: We support all vendors associated directly and indirectly with the dance community value chain. We offer a Loyalty Program, ticketing and scheduling support, community news and more...

imageEdit.fileSizeDanger: File size is very large, will take a long time to upload
imageEdit.fileSizeWarning: File size is large, will take a while to upload
imageEdit.title: Title

eventDetails.title: Title
eventDetails.danceStylesHint: What dance styles will be included?
eventDetails.maxParticipantsHint: How many people can you handle at the event

displaySettings.title: Display Settings
displaySettings.enableBookings: Enable Bookings - Juzt.Dance will accept payments for you
displaySettings.showInNews: Show in News - Adds a card on the news page
displaySettings.overlayText: Overlay Text - Uncheck this if your image has text in it

pricingOptions.title: Pricing and Tickets
pricingOptions.addTicketTypeHint: Press the add ticket type button [+] to add a new ticket. Examples of ticket types could be Full Day Pass, or Half Day Pass.
pricingOptions.additionalOptionsHint: If you have different options such as Dinner to be Included, or Buying a branded T-Shirt
pricingOptions.addTicketOptionHint: Press the add ticket option button [+] to add a new option. Examples of options could be Dinner to be Included, or Buying a branded T-Shirt.

locationSection.title: Location
locationSection.locationHint: If the location is not listed, please add it to the locations

coverImage.title: Cover Image
coverImage.displayedOnHomePage: This image will be displayed on the home page.

loyalty.programDescription: Our Loyalty Program rewards your customers for their continued support. Customers earn stamps with every qualifying purchase, ensuring return visits and awareness.
loyalty.joinProgramDescription: Design your own Loyalty Card and program. Customers join your program by scanning your xxxxxx. Customers present their unique QR Code during their purchases and are rewarded with your stamp.
loyalty.earningStampsDescription: For every qualifying purchase, partners scan the customer's QR code to allocate a stamp to the customer's account.
loyalty.rewardsDescription: Once the customer has collected your required amount of stamps, they are eligible for a reward — typically an additional item of the same type they were buying.
loyalty.nameProgramHint: This is the name users will see when they view their card.
loyalty.stampCardLogoHint: This logo will be displayed on the user's Loyalty Card so make it distinctive so they know it is you!
loyalty.rewardHint: What will a user get when they reach 10 stamps?

partnerBar.title: Partner Bar
partnerBar.description: Manage your partnerships and collaborations effectively.

registerForm.passwordValidation: Please enter a new, secure password.
registerForm.confirmPasswordValidation: Please enter the same password as above.
registerForm.nameHelp: Last name is optional. Venues and Schools can just enter a first name.

forgotForm.error: Unable to send password reset link. Please try again.
forgotForm.successMessage: A password reset link has been sent to your email.
forgotForm.instructions: Please enter your email address. If we find an account with your email address, we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgotForm.emailValidation: Your email address is required to reset your password.

magicLinkForm.instructions: You need to be a registered user to get a Magic Link. Please enter your email address. If we find an account with your email address, we will send you a link that you can use to login automatically (valid for 7 days).
magicLinkForm.emailValidation: Your email address is required to get a Magic Link.
